org.bff.javampd

Interface Admin

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MPDAdmin

    public interface Admin
    Performs MPD administrative tasks
    Author:
    bill

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMPDChangeListener(MPDChangeListener mcl)
      Adds a MPDChangeListener to this object to receive MPDChangeEvents.
      void addOutputChangeListener(OutputChangeListener pcl)
      Adds a OutputChangeListener to this object to receive PlaylistChangeEvents.
      boolean disableOutput(MPDOutput output)
      Disables the passed MPDOutput
      boolean enableOutput(MPDOutput output)
      Enables the passed MPDOutput
      long getDaemonUpTime()
      Returns the daemon uptime in seconds.
      Collection<MPDOutput> getOutputs()
      Returns the information about all outputs
      void killMPD()
      Kills the mpd connection.
      void removePlayerChangedListener(MPDChangeListener mcl)
      Removes a MPDChangeListener from this object.
      void removePlaylistStatusChangedListener(OutputChangeListener pcl)
      Removes a OutputChangeListener from this object.
      void updateDatabase()
      Updates the MPD database by searching the mp3 directory for new music and removing the old music.
      void updateDatabase(String path)
      Updates the MPD database by searching a specific mp3 directory for new music and removing the old music.

    • Method Detail

      • getOutputs

        Collection<MPDOutput> getOutputs()
                                 throws MPDAdminException
        Returns the information about all outputs
        Returns:
        a Collection of MPDOutput
        Throws:
        MPDAdminException - if there is a problem sending the command to the server

      • disableOutput

        boolean disableOutput(MPDOutput output)
                      throws MPDAdminException
        Disables the passed MPDOutput
        Parameters:
        output - the output to disable
        Returns:
        true if the output is disabled
        Throws:
        MPDAdminException - if there is a problem sending the command to the server

      • enableOutput

        boolean enableOutput(MPDOutput output)
                     throws MPDAdminException
        Enables the passed MPDOutput
        Parameters:
        output - the output to enable
        Returns:
        true if the output is enabled
        Throws:
        MPDAdminException - if there is a problem sending the command to the server

        void addMPDChangeListener(MPDChangeListener mcl)
        Adds a MPDChangeListener to this object to receive MPDChangeEvents.
        Parameters:
        mcl - the MPDChangeListener to add

      • removePlayerChangedListener

        void removePlayerChangedListener(MPDChangeListener mcl)
        Removes a MPDChangeListener from this object.
        Parameters:
        mcl - the MPDChangeListener to remove

      • killMPD

        void killMPD()
             throws MPDAdminException
        Kills the mpd connection.
        Throws:
        MPDAdminException - if there is a problem sending the command

      • updateDatabase

        void updateDatabase()
                    throws MPDAdminException
        Updates the MPD database by searching the mp3 directory for new music and removing the old music.
        Throws:
        MPDAdminException - if there is a problem sending the command

      • updateDatabase

        void updateDatabase(String path)
                    throws MPDAdminException
        Updates the MPD database by searching a specific mp3 directory for new music and removing the old music.
        Parameters:
        path - the path
        Throws:
        MPDAdminException - the MPD connection exception

      • getDaemonUpTime

        long getDaemonUpTime()
                     throws MPDAdminException
        Returns the daemon uptime in seconds.
        Returns:
        the daemon uptime in seconds
        Throws:
        MPDAdminException - if the MPD response contains an error

      • addOutputChangeListener

        void addOutputChangeListener(OutputChangeListener pcl)
        Adds a OutputChangeListener to this object to receive PlaylistChangeEvents.
        Parameters:
        pcl - the PlaylistChangeListener to add
